resources.string: To complete the registration process and login, please use this device to access the verification link sent to this email address.
Failure to send verification email. Please try again or provide a different email address.
The provided password is too weak. Please provide a different password to register.
The provided username is malformed. Please provide a valid username to register.
The provided username already exists. Please provide a unique username to register.
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
